description:
Aurora is one of Chitose`s maids. She is usually serious and cold-minded. Probably the exact opposite personality of Charlotte: the second maid of Chitose. She always appears with Charlotte and she usually tries to stop her from being too impulsive.
She also has great editing skills, that even made Nasa surprised (like... her skill of editing was so fast and she even made it like it was real).
Source: Tonikaku Kawaii Wiki
name: Aurora
